name: Dekoder's Revenge
description:
This is an experimental boss-fight I made to improve my way of coding How to play?
  • W, A, D To Move
  • Dodge The Sword And The Spikes Unless You Wanna Die!
  • Spikes Have a Warning Sign Before Popping Out!
  • Last 36 Seconds Against Brick Man To Win!

Game Not Opening Or Lag This Website: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/545686697/

Wanna Run The Source Code? Download this: https://scratch.mit.edu/download

Wanna contact me? Email: adammadycontact@gmail.com
